rooms.name: Entrance and Living Area
rooms.description: A welcoming entry area with open-plan living space that adheres to Bohemian aesthetic. Incorporates vibrant colors, artistic decor, and natural elements.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Larger bedroom with ensuite bathroom, designed for a comfortable and private retreat. Bohemian elements incorporated through decor.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom designed for visitors. Bohemian style with comfortable seating and personalized touches.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Compact living space for servants. Simple yet functional design with essential amenities.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated home theater space in the ground floor. Incorporates Bohemian decor and comfortable seating with wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated into the ground floor. Functional and accessible design with Bohemian accents.

rooms.name: Utility Room / Storage
rooms.description: A utility room for storage and maintenance of home appliances. Designed with practicality in mind.

openings.description: Accessible main door with ramp and wide clearance for wheelchair accessibility.
Large windows to enhance natural light in accordance with Vastu principles, ensuring proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Alternate Option)
rooms.description: If not placed on the ground floor, master bedroom is designed on the first level with ensuite bathroom and wheelchair accessible features.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom (Alternate Option)
rooms.description: An additional guest bedroom on the first floor, maintaining Bohemian decor and accessibility.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace or study area that can be utilized by family members. Bohemian style with ample natural light.

rooms.name: Extra Storage/Balcony
rooms.description: A balcony or additional storage area that provides outdoor space for relaxation and Vastu alignment.

openings.description: An accessible staircase with handrails and a ramp option for wheelchair users.
Window openings on the first floor that connect to the balcony area.
